text: Allakh ne bral Sebe syna i u Nego ne bylo syna. Allakh prevyshe etogo. Nikogda ne bylo u Allakha souchastnikov. Yesli by byli naryadu s Nim drugiye bozhestva, to kazhdyy bog vzyal by sebe to, chto sotvoril, i imel by svoyo tsarstvo nezavisimo ot drugikh, i oni stremilis' by vozvysit'sya drug nad drugom i borolis' by drug s drugom, i rasstroilas' by Vselennaya. Khvala Allakhu! Bezuprechen On i prevyshe togo, chto oni lozhno izmyshlyayut
